headline: Dwayne Haskins at Workout Organized by Former Bills QB Before His Death
author: Nathan Dougherty
sentences:

Dwayne Haskins, a standout at Ohio State before becoming Washington’s first-round pick and playing in Pittsburgh, died this morning when he got hit by a car in South Florida, per his agent Cedric Saunders.

Haskins Had Joined Trubisky in Florida
After spending one season with the Bills, Trubisky signed with the Steelers in March and quickly got to work with his teammates, inviting a group to his home in Florida to practice and train together.

“Dwayne Haskins, a standout at Ohio State before struggling to catch on with Washington and Pittsburgh in the NFL, died this morning when he got hit by a car in South Florida, per his agent Cedric Saunders,” Schefter tweeted.

Trubisky was seizing the chance to move out of Josh Allen’s shadow and take on a leadership role, and NFL Network’s Aditi Kinkhabwala reported on April 5 that he brought along a number of Steelers players with him.
